name: Dinari COST
description: The Dinari COST dShares token (COST.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Costco Wholesale Corporation (COST), one of the largest retail warehouse chains in the world. Costco operates a membership-based bulk retail model, providing customers with access to discounted goods, groceries, electronics, and household essentials. Each COST.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Costco stock share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, COST.d enables investors to gain exposure to the retail and consumer goods sector, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
